title: externalSystemReference
description: Entity used to provide reference to an external system.

id.description: An unique identifier for the externalSystemReference.

link.description: A self referencing link to the externalSystemReference resource.

referenceId.description: The external reference ID from the external system.

referenceType.description: The type of reference ID (e.g., Service Code).

systemName.description: The name of the external system providing the reference.

name.description: The name of the actual externalSystemReference.

description.description: A description of the actual ExternalSystemReference.
